name: Grouplaga
description:
For the GMTK Game Jam 2021 https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-202

Free captured ships to dominate the invaders. Takes the mechanics from a certain old space shooter where you can recover a lost life and brings it up to 11.

Use WASD to move and the mouse to aim and shoot.

Made with love2d, using the libraries

  • 30log: https://github.com/Yonaba/30log
  • mgl: https://github.com/ImagicTheCat/MGL
  • xtype: https://github.com/ImagicTheCat/lua-xtype

Everything else written by me in a weekend. Music recorded on my keytar at 2am ;)
